notes.text:
This update for spice fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-7506: A possible buffer overflow via invalid monitor configurations (bsc#1046779)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: spice versions though 0.13 are vulnerable to out-of-bounds memory access when processing specially crafted messages from authenticated attacker to the spice server resulting into crash and/or server memory leak.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
